resources.string: I kicked some butt in Spades.
I got my butt kicked in Spades.
Point(s) needed to win: 300 (3 books and 00 bags)

This is the first hand so you don\'t need to place a bid. If you would like to bid on the first hand you can change this in the settings. Just tap the wrench icon in the top bar or the 3 dots in the upper right corner.
